wikipedia_page.main: Kevin Geary (born 1952 Lincoln, England.) is an English portrait and abstract artist and poet. Some of his works are in the collections of the National Portrait Gallery, London, the Fine Arts Museums of San Francisco, the Abbey Theatre, Dublin, Wigmore Hall and Arundells.

response: * Kevin Geary – English portrait and abstract artist
English portrait and abstract artist Kevin Geary moved to the Village of Oak Creek in 2008.
